Web Developer

Why not to use super blindly

14 Sep 2013

Lately I have read and heard a lot of people talk about using super to extend behavior instead of using callbacks in Rails. The complaint is that callbacks are hard to test and often violate the simple responsibility principle. Finally, I have heard it said that “super is more OOPish”. I don’t believe that to be wholly true. Let me explain why.

Meeting with the SIB crew everywhere?

04 May 2013

This past week and a half has been hilarious. Even after the program ended I met with people from the Startup Institute every day of the week. The Startup Walkabout helped a lot, but we also had a designated coffee shop last week and this week. I guess it just shows that we are like family, just as I was saying in my last post.

So, how was the Startup Institute's program?

28 Apr 2013

I could give you some facts like the number of tracks there are, the schedule we followed, who came to teach, etc. But I think it is much more interesting to tell you what I got out of it, what I experienced, what I took with me.
